Call me crazy, but personally I don't like fallout.
*dodges sniper bullet*
I think the reason why is because I just as a whole don't like fps games.  I like S.T.A.L.K.E.R., HL2 and Bioshock, but games like Fallout, Halo, CoD and such I just don't care for at all.  I like Fallout 3 and such, but like I haven't touched the game in almost a year.
